name: Gun Shooter Terrorist Kill
description:
Pull the trigger and eliminate the terrorists from your territory. Kill all the evil forces in the region and spread your name in the area. Become the King of Sniper Shooter of the town.

Game Features:
- Boasting spectacular graphics and blistering action sequences.
- Real life sound effects.
- 10+ real world weapons.
- 20+ challenging levels in dozens of worldwide themes
